text: Beardsley House may refer to: *Capt. Philo Beardsley House, Kent, Connecticut *Beardsley–Mix House, West Hartford, Connecticut *Dr. Havilah Beardsley House, Elkhart, Indiana *Ezra E. and Florence (Holmes) Beardsley House, Bronson Township, Michigan *Beardsley-Oliver House, Olean, New York
title: Beardsley House
